creator: andrei.mikhniak@stortext.com
text:
The XPriority example implements the method Priority toPriority(String sArg, 
Priority defaultValue), which is never called by the framework.

The class org.apache.log4j.xml.DOMConfigurator contains the method parsePriority
(Element element, Category cat, boolean isRoot), which contains the following 
call:
Method toPriorityMethod = clazz.getMethod("toPriority", ONE_STRING_PARAM);

This means a method with 1 string parameter is called.


The correct version of the method has to have the signature: method Priority 
toPriority(String sArg).
